body:
In [bitrpc.py](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/contrib/bitrpc/bitrpc.py) beginning on line 251, `SendMany` is missing the `subtractFeeFromAmount` parameter (parameter 5)

The code:
```
elif cmd == "sendmany":
    try:
        frm = raw_input("From: ")
        to = raw_input("To (in format address1:amount1,address2:amount2,...): ")
        mc = raw_input("Minimum confirmations (optional): ")
        comment = raw_input("Comment (optional): ")
        try:
            print access.sendmany(frm,to,mc,comment)
        except:
            print access.sendmany(frm,to)
    except Exception as inst:
        print inst
```

Whats missing:
```
5 subtractfeefromamount   (string, optional) A json array with addresses.
                           The fee will be equally deducted from the amount of each selected address.
                           Those recipients will receive less bitcoins than you enter in their corresponding amount field.
                           If no addresses are specified here, the sender pays the fee.
    [
      "address"            (string) Subtract fee from this address
      ,...
    ]
```

Related: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/6499
title: SendMany RPC missing parameter subtractFeeFromAmount
